awd_titl_txt: Transport Processes in Dense Multiphase Systems
awd_abstract_narration: A combination of analytical and computational techniques for                    the efficient numerical simulation of multiphase systems,                       including acoustic and electrical fields, will be developed.                    Several innovations are proposed to include the lubrication                     force, polidispersivity in the size of bubbles or particles,                    multiparticle interactions and wave propagation.                                                                                                                The work has scientific relevance in multiphase flow and                        processing, and may lead to an efficient use of high                            performance computers.
org_div_long_name: Division of Chemical, Bioengineering, Environmental, and Transport Systems
